product_name: Funhog Press Big Tree Hikes of the Redwood Coast: A Guide to the Giants
long_description: A guide to awe-inspiring forests filled with ancient behemoths, Big Tree Hikes of the Redwood Coast: A Guide to the Giants helps you explore the last tracts of these magnificent trees.
short_description: A guide to awe-inspiring forests filled with ancient behemoths, Big Tree Hikes of the Redwood Coast: A Guide to the Giants helps you explore the last tracts of these magnificent trees.
